moves.11... Na5 12. b3 b5 13. Nd2 b4 14. c4: White has just one assignment: taking away moves from Black...
moves.16... O-O-O: a bad place, for a King to die...
moves.19... Ng8 20. gxh6 Nxh6 21. Bxh6 gxh6 22: preparing to take over Blacks' Kings' wing...
moves.28... Nf7 29. Rh1: setting up a trap: Rh7 is not covered...
moves.32. Bg4: block the whole of Blacks' position: no moves left...
moves.33... Bf6 34. Rf1 Ka6 35. Rxg8: White has a forcing and winning combination...
moves.35... Qxg8 36. Qg6 Qf7 37. Bh5 Qe7 38. Q: Black timed out and resigned: I had my fill...
